cgcloud__Trip_List_Account__c.name: cgcloud__Trip_List_Account__c
cgcloud__Trip_List_Account__c.description: The object stores the association between a trip list and a customer.

LastActivityDate.description: The date when a User last did something related to the record.

cgcloud__Day__c.description: Day of the week on which the call is to be scheduled.

cgcloud__Record_Link__c.description: Link to the detail page of the trip list customer record.

cgcloud__Sort__c.description: Specifies the position of the customer in the trip list.

cgcloud__Valid_From__c.description: Date on the entry from which the trip list is valid.

cgcloud__Valid_Thru__c.description: Date on the entry until which the trip list is valid.
